name: ACE Social Foundation

address: Flat No: 101,6-3-1219/6/1, NCR Subbamma Towers, Uma Nagar, Begumpet

briefDescription: ACE Social Foundation is a 4-year-old registered "Not for Profit" foundation that has been championing skill development & employment opportunity creation for PwD's in India.Our process begins with educating & sensitizing corporates about the abilities of the disabled through Dialogue in the Dark. Dialogue in the Dark- DID is an international empathy experience that puts visitors through daily life situations in complete darkness in a fun & entertaining way. DID heightens oneâ€™s awareness and sensitize the society about the abilities of disabled.Since 2014 as a result of DID sensitization, we have trained 4100 PwDs, received 8000 job pledges& created 3000 jobs for PwDs, across 18 sectors creating a new Rs. 21 crore PwDs economy.
